main event: A UFO sighting was reported on September 1, 1954, in Pasco, Washington, observed to be bright and stationary.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for most of the observation, which lasted for 2 minutes., The object was bright and did not emit any sound or smell., A radar report received similar sightings from the same location., The report includes various conclusions suggesting it could be a balloon or aircraft but deemed insufficient data for final evaluation., The sighting occurred under clear sky conditions.
witness description: employee of the Northern Pacific reported the sighting while in the air
